name: Wavebid, LLC
tag_list: auction, online-auction, clerking, search, cataloging, marketing, saas, software-as-a-service, search-site, auctioneer
overview:
Wavebid is a Software as a Service company. Our objective with Wavebid is to provide auctioneers with insanely great products and services that they love to use and that will make a difference in their lives. Our two websites are:

www.wavebid.com and www.lotnut.com

The wavebid.com website provides auctioneers access to a suite of tools that are used to catalog, market clerk auctions.

The www.lotnut.com website is the worlds first general use, item level search site that lists products and services that are being auctioned off by professional auctioneers at different online bidding sites or live auction events.

The Wavebid founding team has generations of experience in the Auction business, in developing advanced technology solutions, and building and bringing businesses based on them to market. This special mix of talents allows us to create products and services that help auctioneers do what they love the most - be auctioneers.
